name: Hemolymph
description:
An edgy Visual Novel exploring how wild bugs are. Compete in a gladiatorial insect arena, using quick decision making to survive and conquer. Featuring 4 or 5 endings as far as I can remember, maybe even more, who knows.

Made for school, and rather rushed, so there are some spelling errors and bugs (ha).

By JohnLee Cooper, Michael Guattery, and Codi Hotte.
